replies.msg:
咁多位早晨，我今日嚟，係想同你哋講個故事嘅：

喺幾年前
我同一個寡婦結咗婚
佢有一個已成年嘅女
後來嫁咗比我老豆

咁我繼女就做咗我後媽
而我老豆就做咗我女婿

兩年後我老婆同我生咗一個仔
佢喺我後媽嘅同母異父嘅細佬
我個仔叫我「老豆」
我就叫我個仔「舅父」

我繼女又為我老豆生咗一個仔
佢喺我細佬
但佢又要叫我外公

我喺我老婆個老公
但喺我老婆喺我後媽個阿媽喎
所以我喺自己嘅外公

到咗新年
嚟料喇

我就同我後媽同我老豆
即係同我繼女同女婿交換利是

我封廿蚊比我個仔
佢話：「多謝老豆！」
我又答返佢：「唔洗，舅父！喺呢，咁我嗰封呢？」
「你都痴線，我結咗婚喇咩？」唉，我自己都亂咗...

食團年飯嗰陣
我喺抬面上面放咗一封一千蚊利是
再拎返封利是上手
叫咗聲：「多謝外公！」

好彩唔喺街姐
唔係真係比人捉去青山瞓一排
而家諗返自己真喺痴痴地線
自己比錢自己洗
咪即係去自己鋪頭買野...

我有個fd就係咁
拍左好似年幾
都唔敢比老母知
有次佢老母可能sense到 叫佢唔好搞呢啲嘢
分左手會好麻煩
問下誠哥
義不容情？
此回覆已被刪除
誠哥都係咁而發達
有冇諗過其實可能你地未必有血緣關係

replies.msg:
Good morning everyone, today I’m gonna to share a story:

Several years before
I married a widow
She had a grew-up daughter
And her daughter married my father later

So my step-daughter became my step-mother
And my father became my son-in-law

Two years later my wife gave birth for our son
He was also my stepmother’s half-brother
So he called me Dad
And I called him uncle

My step daughter born a son with my father
He is my brother
But He had to call me Grandpa

I am the husband of my wife
But my wife is the mother of my step mother
Therefore I am my grandpa

While Chinese New Year
It came up with....

I exchanged red pockets with my step mother and father
Who are my step daughter and son-in-law

I gave a $20 red pocket to my son
He said, “Thank you, Dad!”
I answered him, “You’re welcome, uncle. How about my red pocket?”
“Nuts!” He said, “I didn’t marry yet, do I?”
Sigh, I mixed up with myself too.

When we had our new year dinner,
I placed a $1000 red pocket on the table
And picked it up
said, “Thank you Grandpa!”

It’s lucky that I was not on the street,
If not I should be grabbed into Castle Peak Hospital.
Now I looked back I am so mad about this
I gave money to myself
Just seems like buying stuff from my own store...

喺幾年前

佢有一個已成年嘅女
後來嫁咗比我老豆

咁我繼女就做咗我後媽
而我老豆就做咗我女婿

兩年後我老婆同我生咗一個仔
佢喺我後媽嘅同母異父嘅細佬
我個仔叫我「老豆」
我就叫我個仔「舅父」

我繼女又為我老豆生咗一個仔
佢喺我細佬
但佢又要叫我外公

我喺我老婆個老公
但喺我老婆喺我後媽個阿媽喎
所以我喺自己嘅外公

嚟料喇

我就同我後媽同我老豆
即係同我繼女同女婿交換利是

我封廿蚊比我個仔
佢話：「多謝老豆！」

「你都痴線，我結咗婚喇咩？」唉，我自己都亂咗...

食團年飯嗰陣
我喺抬面上面放咗一封一千蚊利是
再拎返封利是上手
叫咗聲：「多謝外公！」

好彩唔喺街姐
唔係真係比人捉去青山瞓一排
而家諗返自己真喺痴痴地線
自己比錢自己洗
咪即係去自己鋪頭買野...

Good morning everyone, today I’m gonna to share a story:

Several years before
I married a widow
She had a grew-up daughter
And her daughter married my father later

So my step-daughter became my step-mother
And my father became my son-in-law

Two years later my wife gave birth for our son
He was also my stepmother’s half-brother
So he called me Dad
And I called him uncle

My step daughter born a son with my father
He is my brother
But He had to call me Grandpa

I am the husband of my wife
But my wife is the mother of my step mother
Therefore I am my grandpa

While Chinese New Year
It came up with....

I exchanged red pockets with my step mother and father
Who are my step daughter and son-in-law

I gave a $20 red pocket to my son
He said, “Thank you, Dad!”
I answered him, “You’re welcome, uncle. How about my red pocket?”
“Nuts!” He said, “I didn’t marry yet, do I?”
Sigh, I mixed up with myself too.

When we had our new year dinner,
I placed a $1000 red pocket on the table
And picked it up
said, “Thank you Grandpa!”

It’s lucky that I was not on the street,
If not I should be grabbed into Castle Peak Hospital.
Now I looked back I am so mad about this
I gave money to myself
Just seems like buying stuff from my own store...

咁多位早晨，我今日嚟，係想同你哋講個故事嘅：

喺幾年前
我同一個寡婦結咗婚
佢有一個已成年嘅女
後來嫁咗比我老豆

咁我繼女就做咗我後媽
而我老豆就做咗我女婿

兩年後我老婆同我生咗一個仔
佢喺我後媽嘅同母異父嘅細佬
我個仔叫我「老豆」
我就叫我個仔「舅父」

我繼女又為我老豆生咗一個仔
佢喺我細佬
但佢又要叫我外公

我喺我老婆個老公
但喺我老婆喺我後媽個阿媽喎
所以我喺自己嘅外公

到咗新年
嚟料喇

我就同我後媽同我老豆
即係同我繼女同女婿交換利是

我封廿蚊比我個仔
佢話：「多謝老豆！」
我又答返佢：「唔洗，舅父！喺呢，咁我嗰封呢？」
「你都痴線，我結咗婚喇咩？」唉，我自己都亂咗...

食團年飯嗰陣
我喺抬面上面放咗一封一千蚊利是
再拎返封利是上手
叫咗聲：「多謝外公！」

好彩唔喺街姐
唔係真係比人捉去青山瞓一排
而家諗返自己真喺痴痴地線
自己比錢自己洗
咪即係去自己鋪頭買野...

我同一個寡婦結咗婚
佢有一個已成年嘅女
後來嫁咗比我老豆

再拎返封利是上手

Good morning everyone, today I’m gonna to share a story:

Several years before
I married a widow
She had a grew-up daughter
And her daughter married my father later

So my step-daughter became my step-mother
And my father became my son-in-law

Two years later my wife gave birth for our son
He was also my stepmother’s half-brother
So he called me Dad
And I called him uncle

My step daughter born a son with my father
He is my brother
But He had to call me Grandpa

I am the husband of my wife
But my wife is the mother of my step mother
Therefore I am my grandpa

While Chinese New Year
It came up with....

I exchanged red pockets with my step mother and father
Who are my step daughter and son-in-law

I gave a $20 red pocket to my son
He said, “Thank you, Dad!”
I answered him, “You’re welcome, uncle. How about my red pocket?”
“Nuts!” He said, “I didn’t marry yet, do I?”
Sigh, I mixed up with myself too.

When we had our new year dinner,
I placed a $1000 red pocket on the table
And picked it up
said, “Thank you Grandpa!”

It’s lucky that I was not on the street,
If not I should be grabbed into Castle Peak Hospital.
Now I looked back I am so mad about this
I gave money to myself
Just seems like buying stuff from my own store...

Good morning everyone, today I’m gonna to share a story:

Several years before
I married a widow
She had a grew-up daughter
And her daughter married my father later

So my step-daughter became my step-mother
And my father became my son-in-law

Two years later my wife gave birth for our son
He was also my stepmother’s half-brother
So he called me Dad
And I called him uncle

My step daughter born a son with my father
He is my brother
But He had to call me Grandpa

I am the husband of my wife
But my wife is the mother of my step mother
Therefore I am my grandpa

While Chinese New Year
It came up with....

I exchanged red pockets with my step mother and father
Who are my step daughter and son-in-law

I gave a $20 red pocket to my son
He said, “Thank you, Dad!”
I answered him, “You’re welcome, uncle. How about my red pocket?”
“Nuts!” He said, “I didn’t marry yet, do I?”
Sigh, I mixed up with myself too.

When we had our new year dinner,
I placed a $1000 red pocket on the table
And picked it up
said, “Thank you Grandpa!”

It’s lucky that I was not on the street,
If not I should be grabbed into Castle Peak Hospital.
Now I looked back I am so mad about this
I gave money to myself
Just seems like buying stuff from my own store...
